author: hmijail
content:
With the nightly build of the docker image, when running the GeneralStateTests/stExample with the latest tests commit I get about 30 warnings like 
`WARN [07-18|05:06:15.833] rejected tx                              index=0 hash=fb1842..3a08a4 error="transaction type not supported"`. 
But ends with "no errors detected".

author: hmijail
content: what is the recommended combination of docker image version + tests version at any given point? So that I have the most current version of both such that all tests are known to pass cleanly

author: dimitry8570
content:
The recommended combination is latest retesteth develop, latest test develop.

But it is not stable. Check retesteth.ethdevops.io for the green builds

author: dimitry8570
content: This warnings are expected some tests check that transaction of certain type is rejected before the eip activation
